description:
this course was implemented to the reality of a company and is working excellent

has all the characteristics of a network: scalable, available, security, scalability and easy management

in this course we will learn to define different network layers for example: access, distribution and core

this course was applied to the reality of a company which is currently running

you will know tcp/ip protocol

you will know packet tracer simulator and cisco IOS or GNS3 simulator

you can control the corporate network

you will know cisco technologies

at end of course you will be able to identify current network topology

you will be able to identify network layers (Core, Distribution and access)
title: Cisco: Switching, VTP, Inter Vlan and Etherchannel
